Title: Relates to voting of overseas military voters and special federal voters
Summary: Authorizes electronic absentee ballot applications for military voters and special federal voters; removes requirements that the federal post card application form be included with certain ballot application and ballots; homogenizes military and overseas ballot distribution; requires institutions of higher education to provide students studying abroad with information on how to vote from abroad.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the education law, in relation to overseas military voters and special federal voters
